biotools.summary: an adaptive binning algorithm for robust and efficient genome reconstruction from metagenome assemblies | MetaBAT2 clusters metagenomic contigs into different "bins", each of which should correspond to a putative genome | MetaBAT2 uses nucleotide composition information and source strain abundance (measured by depth-of-coverage by aligning the reads to the contigs) to perform binning

bioschemas.name: MetaBAT 2
bioschemas.summary: an adaptive binning algorithm for robust and efficient genome reconstruction from metagenome assemblies | MetaBAT2 clusters metagenomic contigs into different "bins", each of which should correspond to a putative genome | MetaBAT2 uses nucleotide composition information and source strain abundance (measured by depth-of-coverage by aligning the reads to the contigs) to perform binning

galaxy.summary: MetaBAT2 (Metagenome Binning based on Abundance and Tetranucleotide frequency) is an automated metagenome binningsoftware that integrates empirical probabilistic distances of genome abundance and tetranucleotide frequency.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: an adaptive binning algorithm for robust and efficient genome reconstruction from metagenome assemblies | MetaBAT2 clusters metagenomic contigs into different "bins", each of which should correspond to a putative genome | MetaBAT2 uses nucleotide composition information and source strain abundance (measured by depth-of-coverage by aligning the reads to the contigs) to perform binning
